markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Irrepressible (Ganzi)](/Feats.aspx?ID=2534) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ganzi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=339" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 96 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your contrary nature means you bounce back with prejudice. When you roll a success on a save against an [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) or [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effect, you get a critical success instead.
name: Irrepressible (Ganzi)

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Irrepressible (Ganzi) Source Ancestry Guide pg. 96 2.0 --- Your contrary nature means you bounce back with prejudice. When you roll a success on a save against an emotion or fear effect, you get a critical success instead.
